name: Adventure Capital!
description:
Glory! Honor! Solvency! Visit Adventure Capital, where sword & sorcery meets Silicon Valley. Brave red dragons and red tape. Navigate through ancient ruins and around awkward conversations. You and your fellow founders fight to ultimately acquire the favor of the celestial patrons!

Work at Adventure Capital, where sword and sorcery meets Silicon Valley! Brave red dragons and red tape. Navigate through ancient ruins and awkward conversations. And ultimately, pitch your billion gold idea to receive Celestial funding to pursue your dream! You’re not a businesshero. You’re a business, Hero.
